audioText: En venant au bureau ce matin, j'ai remarqué que les travaux de construction avaient considérablement progressé.
question: When did the speaker notice the construction progress?
options: While coming to the office this morning.
On the way home last evening.
explanation: The text states 'En venant au bureau ce matin, j'ai remarqué que les travaux de construction avaient considérablement progressé' - While coming to the office this morning, I noticed that the construction work had progressed considerably. The phrase 'en venant' indicates a simultaneous action.
